adtraction-locked.description: It seems the track.adtraction.com domain was unable to load or is blocked. With adtraction, any purchase you make in the GOG store supports Heroic financially. Consider removing the block if you wish to contribute.

question.message: Are you sure you want to reset Heroic? This will remove all Settings and Caching but won't remove your Installed games or your Epic credentials. Portable versions (AppImage, WinPortable, ...) of Heroic needs to be restarted manually afterwards.

shortcuts.message: Shortcuts were created on Desktop and Start Menu
shortcuts.message-mac: Shortcuts were created on the Applications folder

install.message: The download links for the Visual C++ Runtimes have been opened. Please install both the x86 and x64 versions.

notfound.message: The Microsoft Visual C++ Runtimes are not installed, which are required by some games

epic.import: Epic Servers are having major outage right now, the game cannot be imported!
epic.install: Epic Servers are having major outage right now, the game cannot be installed!
epic.update: Epic Servers are having major outage right now, the game cannot be updated!

rosetta.message: Heroic requires Rosetta to run correctly on macOS with Apple Silicon chips. Please install it from the macOS terminal using the following command: "softwareupdate --install-rosetta" and restart Heroic.
rosetta.title: Rosetta not found

confirmExit.message: Any unsaved progress might be lost

snap.checkbox: Do not show this message again
snap.message: Some features are not available in the Snap version of the app for now and we are trying to fix it.{{newLine}}Current limitations are: {{newLine}}Heroic will not be able to find Proton from Steam or Wine from Lutris.{{newLine}}{{newLine}}Gamescope, GameMode and MangoHud will also not work since Heroic cannot have access to them.{{newLine}}{{newLine}}To have access to this feature please install Heroic as a Flatpak, DEB or from the AppImage.
snap.title: Heroic is running as a Snap

wine-change.message: We could not find the selected wine version to launch this title ({{selectedWine}}). {{newline}} We found another one, do you want to continue launching using {{foundWine}} ?
wine-change.title: Wine not found!

category-settings.delete-question: Proceeding will permanently remove this category and unassign it from all games. Continue?

emptyLibrary.noGames:
Your library is empty.

Click <4>here to log in with your Epic, GOG.com, or Amazon accounts. Then, your games will show up here in the Library.

To use games or apps from other sources, click
to add them manually.
emptyLibrary.noResults: The current filters produced no results.

epic.offline-notification-body: Online services may not work fully as Epic Games servers are offline!

externalLink.warning: You are about to open an external link.

error.component: No Games found - Try to logout and login again or one of the options bellow

header.no_categories: No custom categories. Add categories using each game menu.

help.amdfsr: AMD's FSR helps boost framerate by upscaling lower resolutions in Fullscreen Mode. Image quality increases from 5 to 1 at the cost of a slight performance hit. Enabling may improve performance.

content.defaultInstallPath: This is the default path preselected when installing games.
content.login: Log in into the different stores.
content.settingsDefault: Shows all settings of Heroic and defaults for games.
content.settingsGame: Show all settings for a game.
content.wineManager: Install different versions of Wine, Proton, Crossover, etc.

help.custom_themes_path: Do not use CSS files from untrusted sources. When in doubt, ask for a review in our Discord channel.
help.custom_themes_wiki: Check the Wiki for more details on adding custom themes. Click here.
help.disable_logs: Toggle this checkbox ON to disable most of the writes to log files (critical information is always logged). Make sure to turn OFF this setting before reporting any issue.
help.disablePlaytimeSync: Disables playtime synchronization with given store's servers (currently only GOG is supported)
help.dxvk: DXVK is a Vulkan-based translational layer for DirectX 9, 10 and 11 games. Enabling may improve compatibility. Might cause issues especially for older DirectX games.
help.dxvkfpslimit: Sets a frame rate cap for DXVK games
help.dxvknvapi: DXVK-NVAPI is an implementation of NVAPI built on top of DXVK and the linux native NVAPI, it allows for the usage of DLSS on Nvidia GPUs.
help.esync: Esync aims to reduce wineserver overhead in CPU-intensive games. Enabling may improve performance.
help.fsync: Fsync aims to reduce wineserver overhead in CPU-intensive games. Enabling may improve performance on supported Linux kernels.

game_language.fallback: Leave blank to use Heroic's language.
game_language.in_game_config: Not all games support this configuration, some have in-game language setting.

help.gamemode: Feral GameMode applies automatic and temporary tweaks to the system when running games. Enabling may improve performance.

gamescope.additionalOptions: Additional commandline flags to pass into gamescope.
gamescope.forceGrabCursor: Always use relative mouse mode instead of flipping dependent on cursor visibility. (Useful for when applications keep losing focus)
gamescope.fpsLimiter: The amount of frames gamescope should limit to. E.g. 60
gamescope.fpsLimiterNoFocus: The frame rate limit gamescope should limit per second if the game is not focused.
gamescope.gameHeight: The height resolution used by the game. A 16:9 aspect ratio is assumed by gamescope.
gamescope.gameWidth: The width resolution used by the game. A 16:9 aspect ratio is assumed by gamescope.
gamescope.upscaleHeight: The height resolution used by gamescope. A 16:9 aspect ratio is assumed.
gamescope.upscaleMethod: The upscaling method gamescope should use.
gamescope.upscaleWidth: The width resolution used by gamescope. A 16:9 aspect ratio is assumed.

help.general: Sync with EGL if you have a working installation of the Epic Games Launcher elsewhere and want to import your games to avoid downloading them again.
help.mangohud: MangoHUD is an overlay that displays and monitors FPS, temperatures, CPU/GPU load and other system resources.
help.msync: Msync aims to reduce wineserver overhead in CPU-intensive games. Enabling may improve performance on supported Linux kernels.

other.part6: to be called after the launch command, for instance:
other.part7: to skip the launcher in some games, etc.

help.preferSystemLibs: Custom Wine versions (Wine-GE, Wine-Lutris) are shipped with their library dependencies. By enabling this option, these shipped libraries will be ignored and Wine will load system libraries instead. Warning! Issues may occur if dependencies are not met.
help.primerun: Use dedicated graphics card to render game on multi-GPU systems. Only needed on gaming laptops or desktops that use a headless GPU for rendering (NVIDIA Optimus, AMD CrossFire)

steam_path.info: This path lets Heroic determine what version of Proton Steam uses, for adding non-Steam games to Steam.

help.steamruntime: Custom libraries provided by Steam to help run Linux and Windows (Proton) games. Enabling might improve compatibility.

sync.part1: Heroic tries to guess the right save folder and this will work on the majority of cases. In case the folder is wrong, use the override box to change it.
sync.part2: In case you change the prefix folder for Wine or Proton, you will need to check the path again since Proton uses a different prefix (/pfx) and username (steamuser). So you can simple erase the current path get out of the sync settings page and get back again for Heroic to guess the folder one more time with the right prefix.
sync.part3: Manual Sync: Choose Download to download the games saves stored on the Cloud. Upload to upload the local ones to the cloud. Force Download and Force Upload will ignore the version that is locally or on the cloud.
sync.part4: Sync Saves Automatically will sync the saves every time you Start a Game and after finishing playing.

help.vkd3d: VKD3D is a Vulkan-based translational layer for DirectX 12 games. Enabling may improve compatibility significantly. Has no effect on older DirectX games, it requires DXVK.

wine.part1: Heroic searches for versions of Wine, Proton, and CrossOver in the following folders:
wine.part2: For other places, use a symbolic link to one of these folders

save-sync.searching: Trying to detect the correct save folder (click to cancel)

infobox.wine-path-invalid: Wine Path is invalid, please select another one.
infobox.wine-path-none-found: No Wine version was found, download one from the Wine Manager

wine-repfix.message: Wine uses what is called a WINEPREFIX to encapsulate Windows applications. This prefix contains the Wine configuration files and a reproduction of the file hierarchy of C: (the main disk on a Windows OS). In this reproduction of the C: drive, your game save files and dependencies installed via winetricks are stored.

login.message: Login with your platform. You can login to more than one platform at the same time.
login.old-mac: Your macOS version is {{version}}. macOS 12 or newer is required to log in.

steam.corrupt: {{game}} could not be added to all found Steam users. See logs for more info. A restart of Steam is required for changes to take effect.
steam.success: {{game}} was successfully added to Steam. A restart of Steam is required for changes to take effect.
steam.title: Added to Steam

steam.corrupt: {{game}} could not be removed from all found Steam users. See logs for more info. A restart of Steam is required for changes to take effect.
steam.success: {{game}} was successfully removed from Steam. A restart of Steam is required for changes to take effect.
steam.title: Removed from Steam

notify.new-heroic-version: A new Heroic version was released!

refresh.error: Couldn't fetch releases from upstream, maybe because of Github API restrictions! Try again later.

offline-message.hint: We are checking the connectivity against:{{newline}}github.com,{{newline}}gog.com,{{newline}}store.epicgames.com and{{newline}}cloudflare-dns.com

error.equal_sign_in_key: Variable names can't contain the "=" sign

env_variables.example: Do NOT include the "=" sign, e.g: for a setting like "MY_FLAG=123", set MY_FLAG in NAME and 123 in VALUE.
env_variables.info: Set environment variables to append to the command.

error.command: The %command% syntax from Steam is not valid as game arguments.
error.env: Environment variables must be configured in the table below.

setting.addgamestostartmenu: Add games to start menu automatically
setting.after-launch-script-path: Select a script to run after the game exits

confirmation.message: Games with broken or denied anticheat may run, but multiplayer features won't work. Do not ask for support if you install them knowing this.

allow_installation_broken_anticheat.label: Allow installation of games with broken or denied anticheat

setting.alt-gogdl-bin: Choose an Alternative GOGDL Binary to use

setting.change-target-exe: Select an alternative EXE to run
setting.checkForUpdatesOnStartup: Check for Heroic Updates on Startup

custom_css.warning: Warning: this applies to the whole frontend. That means the wrong style can render Heroic unusable. If needed, the setting can be changes manually in `~/.config/heroic/config.json`. Do NOT copy styles from sources you don't trust.

setting.defaultWinePrefix: Set Folder for new Wine Prefixes
setting.download-no-https: Download games without HTTPS (useful for CDNs e.g. LanCache)
setting.enableFSRHack: Enable FSR Hack (Wine version needs to support it)

eosOverlay.notInstalled: The EOS Overlay is not installed

confirmation.message: This feature is still experimental. Please report any issues you encounter with it on GitHub.

setting.gamemode: Use GameMode (Feral Game Mode needs to be installed)

gamescope.missingMsg: We could not found gamescope on the PATH. Install it or add it to the PATH.

log.instructions: Join our Discord and look for the "#-support" section. Read the pinned "Read Me First | Frequently Asked Questions" thread and follow the instructions to share these logs and any relevant information about your problem.

done.content: Uploaded to {{url}} (URL copied to your clipboard)

error.content: Failed to upload log file. Check Heroic's general log for details

setting.mangohud: Enable Mangohud (Mangohud needs to be installed)
setting.maxworkers: Maximum Number of Workers when downloading

confirmation.message: Only one graphics card was detected in this system. Please note that this option is intended for multi-GPU systems with headless GPUs (like laptops). On single-GPU systems, the GPU is automatically used & enabling this option can cause issues. Do you really want to enable this option?
confirmation.title: Only 1 GPU detected

savefolder.not-found: Save folder not found, please select it manually (click to retry)
savefolder.placeholder: Select the exact save games folder
savefolder.warning: Please check twice if the path is correct (click to retry)

clearCache.help1: This action will clear the following caches:
clearCache.help2: Third-party game info (scores, steam compatibility, howlongtobeat, pcgamingwiki, applegamingwiki)
clearCache.help3: Legendary library info (list of games, install dialog info, game info)
clearCache.help4: GOG library info (list of games, install dialog info, api info -i.e: requirements-)
clearCache.help5: Amazon library info (list of games, install dialog info)

resetHeroic.help: This will remove all Settings and Caching but won't remove your Installed games or your Epic credentials. Portable versions (AppImage, WinPortable, ...) of Heroic needs to be restarted manually afterwards.

settings.default_hint: Changes in this section only apply as default values when installing games. If you want to change the settings of an already installed game, use the Settings button in the game page.

gameModeRequired.message: GameMode is required for the EAC runtime to work on Flatpak. Do you want to enable it now?
gameModeRequired.title: GameMode required

eacRuntimeEnabled.message: The EAC runtime is enabled, which won't function correctly without GameMode. Do you want to disable the EAC Runtime and GameMode?
eacRuntimeEnabled.title: EAC runtime enabled

log.long-log-hint: Log truncated, last 1000 lines are shown!

offline.warning: This game does not explicitly allow offline mode, turn this on at your own risk. The game may not work.

saves.gog_linux_native_warning: Linux native games do not support GOG's Cloud Saves feature. Use the Windows version instead.
saves.not_supported: This game does not support Cloud Saves.
saves.warning: Cloud Saves feature is in Beta, please backup your saves before syncing (in case something goes wrong)

settings.wineprefix: Select a Folder for new Wine Prefixes

library.addGame: Add your own games or apps to the library by clicking here. They can be basically anything, even Browser URLs.
library.categories: Organize your games into categories to keep things tidy.

end.intro: That's it! Enjoy your games and have fun!
end.title: Enjoy your games!

library.filters: Filter your games by store, platform, favorites and more using these options.
library.gameCard: Left-Click on the game card to navigate to the game page and to see details and adjust settings or Right-click to open the context menu.
library.refresh: Refresh your library to check for new games or updates.
library.search: Use the Search bar to search for your games.
library.sortOptions: Click here to sort games alphabetically.
library.viewToggle: Switch between grid and list view for your games.

welcome.intro: Welcome to the Heroic Library! This is where you can see all your games across different stores.
welcome.intro2: If the library is empty, make sure to login with your accounts usinge the Manage accounts on the sidebar or add your own games using the Add Game button above.
welcome.title: Welcome to Heroic!

sidebar.accessibility: Access accessibility features to customize your experience.
sidebar.accounts: Manage your connected store accounts (Epic, GOG, Amazon), logout or login on them.
sidebar.community: Join our community on Discord and support Heroic's development.
sidebar.docs: Read documentation for help with using Heroic.
sidebar.downloads: Track and manage your game downloads and installations.
sidebar.library: Access your game library from different stores in one place.
sidebar.login: Log in to your game store accounts to access your library.
sidebar.settings: Configure Heroic's settings, game defaults, check logs and more.
sidebar.stores: Browse and shop for games in different stores including Epic, GOG, and Amazon.
sidebar.version: Check your current Heroic version, click it to see latest changelog, and access this tour from the help icon.

welcome.intro: Welcome to Heroic! This sidebar contains all the navigation options to explore the app.
welcome.title: Sidebar Navigation

sidebar.wine: Manage or download new version of Wine/Proton/GPTK for running Windows games on Linux or macOS.

two_col_table.save_hint: Changes in this table are not saved automatically. Click the + button

userselector.logout_confirmation: Are you sure you want to log out?
userselector.quitMessage: Are you sure you want to quit?

manager.not-found: No Wine versions found. Please click the refresh icon to try again.
manager.title: Wine Manager

wineExplanation.proton-ge: GE-Proton is a Proton variant created by Glorious Eggroll. It is meant to be used along with the umu launcher (default in Heroic).
wineExplanation.wine-ge: Wine-GE-Proton is a Wine variant created by Glorious Eggroll. It has been deprecated in favor of GE-Proton with the umu launcher.

winetricks.nothingYet: Nothing was installed by Winetricks yet
